concept.title: What is Snagit?
concept.shortdesc: With Snagit you can capture your screen and edit the result.

conbody.p: Snagit is an image editing software that allows you to take screenshots and edit images. It provides a variety of tools such as Text, Cut, Shape and Crop., Crop and Simplify.
You can simplify the UI of the screenshot or blur parts of it that need to remain confidential.
